nodes.text: Star Wars: Return of the Jedi is a book-and-record children's book published in 1983. It was a narrative retelling of Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. It was a part of Buena Vista Records' Read-Along Adventures series and was produced by Jymn Magon. The cassette tape version was re-released in a collection along with the other two original films' adaptations in 1984.

Story, Music and Photos from the original motion picture captured on a 24 page children's book and 33 1/3 record. "Give your child a head start in learning to read with this 24 page book filled with full-color illustrations and a 7 inch 33 1/3 rpm long playing read-along record."
